fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Food Safety, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Animal Welfare, Environment, Firearms, Food Labeling, Digital Communications, Agriculture, Wildlife Management, Invasive Alien Species,  Rural Services and Communities
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We belong to FACE-UK which feeds into Federation of European Hunting Associations (FACE).
goals__remit: The Countryside Alliance works for everyone who loves the countryside and the rural way of life. Our aim is to protect and promote life in the countryside and to help it thrive.
inter_groups: Intergroup on Biodiversity, Hunting and Countryside
relevant_communication: Meetings with UK MEPs, email communication with MEPs and hosting parliamentary events e.g drinks reception.
